Justification: To assess for anemia, infection, or other blood abnormalities that could contribute to fatigue.
To rule out hypothyroidism, which can cause fatigue.
Vitamin D deficiency can contribute to fatigue.
To assess for iron deficiency anemia, which can cause fatigue.
To rule out diabetes, which can cause fatigue.
To assess for sleep disorders, such as sleep apnea, which can contribute to fatigue.
